Title: Hit Medicine
Description:
Our warriors are fighting to keep the yaungol at bay in the Kun-Lai Pass to the northwest.

Take this liniment.  It is a powerful medicine that has been passed down in my family over the generations.

Use the dit da jow to heal the injured warriors if you do not have healing powers of your own to use on them.
ObjectivesText: Use the Dit Da Jow or your own healing to aid 8 Injured Binan Warriors.
CompletionText: There are yet more injured warriors in need of aid, $c.
RewardText:
You have my thanks, $n. You have shown great honor through your actions.

I hope that my family's dit da jow was of some use to you.
